import React from 'react' import { useState } from "react" import { useNavigate ,Link} from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; const AddUser = () => { const [user, SetUser] = useState(( { email: '', password: '' } )) const [message, SetMessage] = useState(); const { email, password } = user const handleChange = ((e) => { SetUser({ ...user, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) }) const submitForm = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() await axios.post('http://localhost:4000/add-user', user).then((result) => { console.log(result); SetMessage("Sucessfully Added") }).catch((err) => { alert("ALready Email") }) } return (
